data.prayer: There are 589,200 people living in the county of Cantabria. Only about 9,434 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.section_summary: On average, 59 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Cantabria to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of El Astillero
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of El Astillero, Cantabria, Spain.
Father, please raise up prophets in Cantabria who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Cantabria.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain has a population of 589,200.

We estimate Cantabria has 9,434 people who might know Jesus, 446,074 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 133,692 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Cantabria, Cantabria, Spain that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
